title: Programming Skill Enhancement Workshop: Applying a 7-Stage Learning Design Model for Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design a mathematics lesson plan using a 7-stage instructional design model (goal setting, assessment planning, activity design, resource allocation, learning analysis, feedback design, iterative improvement).
Learners can construct a mathematics task sequence tailored to their proficiency level in a VR-based simulation environment.
Using smartphone-compatible instructional design tools, learners can systematically integrate educational resources (question banks, videos) with activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
